revision.text: {{also|Yarborough}} ==English== ===Etymology=== After the second {{w|Earl of Yarborough}} (b. 1809), who supposedly bet 1,000 to 1 that such a hand would not occur. ===Noun=== {{en-noun}} # {{lb|en|card games}} A [[hand]], in [[bridge]] or [[whist]], that has no [[card]] with a value greater than nine (and no aces), though in some circles it is no card above a ten. [[Category:English eponyms]]
